article.title: Status and history for [pes_2]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: Now identified as 639-3 prs, BCP47 fa-AF, thanks to Shervin Afshar.
stage 4, thanks to Behnam Esfahbod. Now identified as a Farsi, Western translation (used to be prd).
stage 2: entered in the index, OHCHR identified as the source.
